meanings.definition: The quality or state of being horrid.
meanings.sent1: The horridness of the situation left everyone feeling uneasy.
meanings.sent2: The horridness of the movie made me cover my eyes.
meanings.sent3: Despite the horridness of the weather, they decided to go for a walk.
meanings.sent4: The horridness of the news hit her like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The horridness of the smell in the room was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: Something that is extremely unpleasant or disagreeable.
meanings.sent1: The horridness of the taste made him spit out the food.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the horridness of the noise coming from the construction site.
meanings.sent3: The horridness of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The horridness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over them.
meanings.sent5: The horridness of the experience haunted her dreams.
